about_the_game:
STORY

When the self-proclaimed "best secret agent in the world" starts his week-long holiday, he is anticipation nothing more than a simple hiking holiday with a grizzled guide up an unnamed mountain. Unfortunately for him, his enemies decided that would be far too boring...

DETAILS

This is a very short, comedic TEST visual novel, designed as a test for both writing visual novels (originally with VN Maker and then Ren'Py) and dealing with Steamworks, as well as being used as a testbed for anything new.

Features include :

  • Visit Chichester (not personally though)
  • The ability to give your character a name! Wow!
  • Comedy
  • Quirky characters
  • Internal and Steam achievements
  • Spanish and Italian language support (minus a few small things). This has been provided by Daniele Ferrari (daniele.ferrari1994@yahoo.it)
  • Non-tested Mac version included

Features music by Kevin MacLeod (Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0) and some graphics from Pexels, as well as the standard characters from Visual Novel Maker

Characters
Grendel Jinx


Lorinda Ella


Hotel Receptionist

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
Backgrounds by Mustikadewia and characters by Larvinlucas

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Welcome To... Chichester 0 : Preview

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
